docs.text: Git - Misc cache token to cache token (use token instead of password) (for 15 minutes, by default). src: github $ git config credential.helper cache or for 1 hour $ git config credential.helper 'cache --timeout=3600'
docs.title: Misc

docs.text: to cache token (use token instead of password) (for 15 minutes, by default). src: github $ git config credential.helper cache or for 1 hour $ git config credential.helper 'cache --timeout=3600'
docs.title: cache token

docs.text: Intellij - Misc Search for ; and replace with ;\r\n For a file where each values are separated with ';' but need each values on a new line to compare files. replace ; enable regex by ;\r\n To revert, do it in Notepad++ with a record sequence
docs.title: Misc

docs.title: Search for ; and replace with ;\r\n

docs.text: MkDocs - Getting Started Installation $ pip install mkdocs check $ mkdocs --version Initialize current folder $ mkdocs new . Build documentation $ mkdocs build Deploy to github First synchronize current folder with corresponding github repository. $ mkdocs gh-deploy
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text: First synchronize current folder with corresponding github repository. $ mkdocs gh-deploy
docs.title: Deploy to github
